reviewText:
This program has a variety of soccer shooting drills that will be helpful to most competitive soccer teams. The video has both serious drills as well as a lot of fun drills. We have used this video over the course of a 12 week 20 game season. Not only did we notice more shots on goal but out travel team improved to the best record in the league. All my players have seen this video and we all love it! The coaching staff attributes our scoring improvement to this program as well as the other great programs put out by the same producer. Among our favorites are CHAMPIONSHIP SOCCER DRILLS and
34 SOCCER GOALIE DRILLS.
This program, SOCCER SHOOTING DRILLS is highly recommended!

This DVD delivers as advertised. It is very attractively put together and altogether well-done. I have bought other programs from this producer in other sports and everyone is worth the money paid! A clear explanation of each shooting drill is given. This is a great addition to anyone's resource library who coaches youth soccer. Parents who want to go out with their kids and practice will also find this beneficial. This is great value.
Terrible video, don't bother wasting your money/
These drills are nice for a team to practice. They are used by the more expensive clubs in my neighborhood that would charge a lot to learn them so this DVD is saving us money.

Without a question, SOCCER SHOOTING DRILLS will give your team more chances to succeed on the soccer field. These popular soccer titles by Marty Schupak are also available on Amazon's Video On Demand program for as low as $2.99. Championship Soccer Drills Backyard Soccer Drills 34 Soccer Goalie Drills Soccer Shooting Drills Soccer Fast Footwork Drills Advanced Soccer Drills

I was surprised at the quality soccer instruction this program offers. This was first lent to me by another soccer mom and I really liked it. My son worked on the skills shown in the video and we have seen improvement. These popular soccer titles by Marty Schupak are also available on Amazon's Video On Demand program for as low as $2.99. Championship Soccer Drills Backyard Soccer Drills 34 Soccer Goalie Drills Soccer Shooting Drills Soccer Fast Footwork Drills Advanced Soccer Drills

Unlike some other soccer videos our league have purchased, this program was professionally put together with creative drills plus excellent tips given by the voiceover. I highly recommend this program for most youth soccer programs as well as school teams! Soccer Coaching:Championship Soccer Drills This program is also popular for soccer teams & leagues. Soccer Coaching:Schupak's Soccer 6 Pack DVD Set Love soccer? Consider this set comprised of six DVDs by Marty Schupak.

I got this video for my 10 year old son thinking that it would show him some neat tips and tricks to improve his game, but it's basically a training video for coaches, and not a very good one at that. The voice over for the video is dated and very boring. The drills are also pretty basic and boring. Nothing really spectacular here. The whole video looks like it was shot in your neighborhood park, it's not very professional at all. I can't believe what they are charging for this video!! I paid 24.99 and am totally disappointed. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!

What's the deal with soccer shooting? We don't take out a gun and fire at that funny shaped sphere. Why do they call it a shot when there is no Dr. or needle around? Here's what SOCCER SHOOTING DRILLS is: A compilation of drills directed at players giving them the best chance to be successful. All in all this is a "value added" asset for soccer coaches like me. When I am beating my brains out trying to organize our next practice, I'll turn on this video and not only take a few drills for practice but create new ones from ideas seen. There is a time for work and a time for fun in all soccer practices. This program has both! What it may lack in perfect technique is made up with credible fun skill drills. This is one product that I have no trouble recommending. Soccer Coaching:Championship Soccer Drills This reviewer also gave this other soccer program a positive review.

SOCCER SHOOTING DRILLS will put your team in a
position to score more goals and you can't ask for anything more than that!
A NICE PROGRAM FOR ALL SOCCER ENTHUSIASTS!

Tighten your cleats, fill your soccer ball with air, meet the rest of your team and go through SOCCER SHOOTING DRILLS in a diligent manner and your team will succeed. I know because our team did. Great drills! Great explanations!
GO FOR IT!

SOCCER SHOOTING DRILLS has great drills involving the entire team so the kids don't have to stand in line waiting for their turn, getting antsy and goofing off. No more lines... no more boring drills... no more complicated set-ups. You can choose a couple games, add a scrimmage, and have a ready-made, fun, purposeful practice. Great work!
VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
